title: How long is a free Zoom meeting? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can enjoy group meetings up to 40 minutes while using free version and with a number of 100 members If you want unlimited duration of meetings then you have to buy Zoom pro version. The Free Features of Zoom app are described as under… Zoom app offers unlimited one on one audio,video calling without any limit. Zoom app offers free group meetings with up to 100 participants and 40 minutes of duration.(For unlimited duration and to increase the number of participants you have to buy Zoom app pro version) You are free to share your screen in one on one video and audio call for unlimited time but you can share your screen in group meeting for only 40 minutes. Now the question raises in our mind is What is the price of Zoom pro version per/month on anum ?? Price:Zoom cost almost 15 $/month for its pro version. 1: 14.99$ Exactly for small or great teams 2:19.99$/month for small and medium firms and also for the last Enterprises.You can save up to 30$ if you buy the yearly plan of zoom app in 149$/year

The free version of Zoom limits you to a 40 minute meeting. On top of that, you won’t be able to record your meeting, either. Should you wish to go with the Zoom Pro option, those limits would be removed, but it does cost $14.99 per month to use. If you have an .edu Gmail account (i.e. teacher or student) a good free alternative is Google Meet.[1] If not, your best bet would then be Skype. No limits there, either. **Update** In light of the recent coronavirus issues, Zoom has removed their time limits on basic accounts for the time being. There is now NO limit to the amount of time you can conference for! Footnotes[1] Meet
